thread.title: HORGAN, JEAN

author: HORGAN, JEAN
title: HORGAN, JEAN
text: Bought my Tablet at Soundstore on Feb. 5th. Got wonderful advise from a nice young gent , so helpful , as all your staff are . not forgetting Katherina who gives me great help always with my photos. Nothing a problem to her ! As for gent who sold me my Samsung & fab. cover ,Thank You . He offered to get me set up on it as i a novice to all these new gadgets , but I assured him , of my Family to get me going . I enjoy it so much now & delighted with my experience in store . Size perfect as advised . Thank You All !!
